channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 01:33 Driven the anxiety in Zaporozhye and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community. Solve for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 01:33 Driven the anxiety in Zaporozhye and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
